page.title: 12Interesting People
page.content: MRS.EDWARDS Mrs.Edwards is fifty-two years old and she was born in Folksworth in 1933.Her first name is Brenda.She has only one child and no pets.Mrs.Edwards's father and grandparents were burid in Folksworth Church.Mrs. Edwards has been married for twenty-eight years and enjoys being married.Mrs.Edwards would like to see the pond and surrounding area much cleaner.Mrs.Edwards has worked at the school for thirty years.She is the school dinner lady.She enjoys working at the school and has seen many changes.There has been three headteachers while she has been there.
